short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Opens all steam pages in your steam client.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One of your friends sents you a Steam page link and it just won't open in the Steam cilent? This extension is a solution for you. On each Steam page, an "Open in Steam Client" button is displayed. Simply click on the button and the page is opened in the Steam Client.
